DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the 18-month trial is to evaluate the natural history of geographic atrophy by assessing the rate of progression of the geographic atrophic lesion over time.
DOC.brief_title: The Natural History of Geographic Atrophy Progression (GAP) Study
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of geographic atrophy secondary to agerelated macular degeneration with no CNV lesion. Age related
